keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Defeat All New Fish-Man Pirates Officers
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates simultaneously defeat all the New Fish-Man Pirates officers, with Luffy defeating Hody Jones, Zoro defeating Hyouzou, Sanji helping defeat Wadatsumi, Chopper defeating Dosun, Franky defeating Ikaros Much, Brook defeating Zeo, and Usopp defeating Daruma.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the collective strength of the Straw Hats after their two-year training period and marks the end of the Fish-Man Island Arc's main conflict.

keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Completely Defeated
keyMoments.description: All officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates are defeated by the Straw Hat Pirates, with Hody Jones knocked unconscious by Luffy's Elephant Gatling, marking the end of their attempted coup.
keyMoments.significance: The complete defeat of the antagonist crew, ending their plan to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and showing the futility of their hatred-driven ideology.
